name: Rainy Grass Hill Simulator
description:
It was a rainy day, I was sitting indoors and I felt like bringing nature inside with a little game. 

After you press Run Game, all the grass is being planted and that takes a while.

There is a Full Screen button in the bottom right corner if you want that.

The game might lag heavily, there is a lot of grass and I have only tested on my own computer.
